item.description:
WOW member Reverend Victoria A. Pretti has invited us to the annual Bike Blessing and BBQ Block Party. Those who are interested in riding to the event as a group can meet at the above place and time. Kickstands up at 10 am.  If you want breakfast at Bickford's, get there earlier.  For more info on the event, see below:

 

Dear Motorcycle Brothers & Sisters,

This Spring, I'll be doing my 'fourth annual' blessing of the motorcyclists!

It is our second year here at Church of Our Saviour in Milton,

and the entire congregation is looking forward to welcoming you again.

I hope that you can all join us.

We're looking forward to offering a short service of blessing,

along with food, live rock music by "B.B. Gunz", raffle, blessed keychains, and Biker fellowship.

As always, there is no charge but voluntary donations are gratefully accepted.

The blessing block party this year will be held on:

Sunday May 5th

BLOCK PARTY STARTS at 12:00pm

Blessing Service at 2pm

Music and Food Continuous

The Episcopal Church of Our Saviour,

453 Adams Street, Milton, MA.

Block Party BBQ, Music, Raffle 12 to 3 pm

This is a rain or shine event!

If the weather is inclement, please come anyway and bring your helmets, keys, gear etc. to be blessed.

Contact info is below, please call or email me if you have any questions.

Thanks and peace, Viki Pretti - STAR 400 Chaplain

The Reverend Victoria A. Pretti

Priest & Pastor

Episcopal Church of Our Saviour

453 Adams Street, Milton, MA 02186

(617) 698-4757

pastor@cos-milton.org
item.name: Bike Blessing in Milton
